verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> that they separate themselves <S%H5144><s%> from the holy things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and that they profane <S%H2490><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> in those things which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> hallow <S%H6942><s%> unto me: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> among your generations, <S%H1755><s%> that <S%H834><s%> goeth <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hallow <S%H6942><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from my presence: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

What man soever <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> is a leper, <S%H6879><s%> or <S%H176><s%> hath a running issue; <S%H2100><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> he be clean. <S%H2891><s%> And whoso toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any thing <S%H3605><s%> that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead, <S%H5315><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> seed <S%H7902><s%> <S%H2233><s%> goeth <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> him;

Or <S%H176><s%> whosoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing, <S%H8318><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> he may be made unclean, <S%H2930><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> he may take uncleanness, <S%H2930><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> he hath;

The soul <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath touched <S%H5060><s%> any such shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> even, <S%H6153><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the holy things, <S%H6944><s%> unless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> he wash <S%H7364><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And when the sun <S%H8121><s%> is down, <S%H935><s%> he shall be clean, <S%H2891><s%> and shall afterward <S%H310><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the holy things; <S%H6944><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is his food. <S%H3899><s%>

That which dieth of itself, <S%H5038><s%> or is torn <S%H2966><s%> with beasts, he shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> himself therewith: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine ordinance, <S%H4931><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> they bear <S%H5375><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> it, and die <S%H4191><s%> therefore, if <S%H3588><s%> they profane <S%H2490><s%> it: I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

There shall no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> stranger <S%H2114><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing: <S%H6944><s%> a sojourner <S%H8453><s%> of the priest, <S%H3548><s%> or a hired servant, <S%H7916><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing. <S%H6944><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> buy <S%H7069><s%> any soul <S%H5315><s%> with his money, <S%H7075><s%> <S%H3701><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it, and he that is born <S%H3211><s%> in his house: <S%H1004><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of his meat. <S%H3899><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> also be <S%H1961><s%> married unto a stranger, <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> may not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of an offering <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things. <S%H6944><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> a widow, <S%H490><s%> or divorced, <S%H1644><s%> and have no <S%H369><s%> child, <S%H2233><s%> and is returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> as in her youth, <S%H5271><s%> she shall eat <S%H398><s%> of her father's meat: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3899><s%> <S%H1><s%> but there shall no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> stranger <S%H2114><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> thereof.

And if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> unwittingly, <S%H7684><s%> then he shall put <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof unto <S%H5921><s%> it, and shall give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> <S%H853><s%> with the holy thing. <S%H6944><s%>

And they shall not <S%H3808><s%> profane <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H853><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

Or suffer them to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of trespass, <S%H819><s%> when they eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> their holy things: <S%H6944><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Whatsoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of <S%H4480><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> will offer <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his vows, <S%H5088><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> his freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they will offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%>
Ye shall offer at your own will <S%H7522><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> of the beefs, <S%H1241><s%> of the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or of the goats. <S%H5795><s%>

But whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> hath a blemish, <S%H3971><s%> that shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> offer: <S%H7126><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> acceptable <S%H7522><s%> for you.

And whosoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H3588><s%> offereth <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to accomplish <S%H6381><s%> his vow, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> in beefs <S%H1241><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> perfect <S%H8549><s%> to be accepted; <S%H7522><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> blemish <S%H3971><s%> therein.

Blind, <S%H5788><s%> or <S%H176><s%> broken, <S%H7665><s%> or <S%H176><s%> maimed, <S%H2782><s%> or <S%H176><s%> having a wen, <S%H2990><s%> or <S%H176><s%> scurvy, <S%H1618><s%> or <S%H176><s%> scabbed, <S%H3217><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> these <S%H428><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Either a bullock <S%H7794><s%> or a lamb <S%H7716><s%> that hath any thing superfluous <S%H8311><s%> or lacking in his parts, <S%H7038><s%> that mayest thou offer <S%H6213><s%> for a freewill offering; <S%H5071><s%> but for a vow <S%H5088><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be accepted. <S%H7521><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that which is bruised, <S%H4600><s%> or crushed, <S%H3807><s%> or broken, <S%H5423><s%> or cut; <S%H3772><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> any offering thereof in your land. <S%H776><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> from a stranger's hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall ye offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> of any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of these; <S%H428><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their corruption <S%H4893><s%> is in them, and blemishes <S%H3971><s%> be in them: they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for you.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> a bullock, <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a goat, <S%H5795><s%> is brought forth, <S%H3205><s%> then it shall be <S%H1961><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the dam; <S%H517><s%> and from the eighth day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8066><s%> and thenceforth <S%H1973><s%> it shall be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for an offering <S%H7133><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And whether it be cow <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> ewe, <S%H7716><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> kill <S%H7819><s%> it and her young <S%H1121><s%> both in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
And when <S%H3588><s%> ye will offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> offer <S%H2076><s%> it at your own will. <S%H7522><s%>

On the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be eaten up; <S%H398><s%> ye shall leave <S%H3498><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it until <S%H5704><s%> the morrow: <S%H1242><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye profane <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> but I will be hallowed <S%H6942><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which hallow <S%H6942><s%> you,
That brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
